location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Public Department, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication from the Resident, dated 17 February 1818. It informs him that the Governor of Bombay approves of the sanction given to John Williams to travel to England on health grounds.
